projects.title: ShowScout
projects.description: ShowScout is a web application that allows users to log in with their Spotify account and view upcoming shows of their favorite artists. The application leverages the Spotify API to fetch the list of artists the user follows and displays their upcoming concerts using the TicketMaster API.
